hints.content:
This rectangle is split into $3$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{thirds}$, with $2$ pieces shaded.  

![A rectangle has 2 horizontal lines dividing it into 3 equal parts. Two parts are shaded red.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a36900370fb7c7be90e9c7a168a540146b4788c0)

This rectangle has two thirds of the shape shaded.

This rectangle is **not** split into $2$ equal-sized pieces. 

![A rectangle has 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 unequal parts. The smallest part is shaded gold.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/823bc88c2a3560f7fbf6e566878e4c67ebd7fece)

These rectangles are split into $2$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{halves}$, with $1$ piece shaded.  

![A rectangle has 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d3fbf22c6e01a686abb3f02af7b1b4728f0c33d0)  ![A rectangle has 1 vertical line dividing it into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8bd845e5f5ecdfcc3980fa977e79c2a8738d274d)

The rectangles have one half of the shape shaded.

These rectangles have **one half** of the shape shaded:

![A rectangle has 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d3fbf22c6e01a686abb3f02af7b1b4728f0c33d0)  ![A rectangle has 1 vertical line dividing it into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8bd845e5f5ecdfcc3980fa977e79c2a8738d274d)

question.content:
**Which rectangles show one half of the shape shaded?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 2]]

choices.content: ![A rectangle has 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d3fbf22c6e01a686abb3f02af7b1b4728f0c33d0)
![A rectangle has 1 horizontal line dividing it into 2 unequal parts. The smallest part is shaded gold.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/823bc88c2a3560f7fbf6e566878e4c67ebd7fece)
![A rectangle has 1 vertical line dividing it into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8bd845e5f5ecdfcc3980fa977e79c2a8738d274d)
![A rectangle has 2 horizontal lines dividing it into 3 equal parts. Two parts are shaded red.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a36900370fb7c7be90e9c7a168a540146b4788c0)
